Using powerful new observations from NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope, the research shows how dark matter gathered ordinary matter in

articles.title: Ottawa Senators make it four straight with victory over Pittsburgh Penguins
articles.description: The Ottawa Senators got the job done in Steeltown on Monday night. The Senators extended their winning streak to four straight games with a hard-fought 3-2 victory over Sidney Crosby and the Pittsburgh Penguins at PPG Paints Arena. articles.title: This brain discovery is forcing scientists to rethink how memory works
articles.description: A new brain imaging study reveals that remembering facts and recalling life events activate nearly identical brain networks. Researchers expected clear differences but instead found strong overlap across memory types. The finding challenges decades of memory research. It may also help scientists bet

articles.description: Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon said the 'refreshed' AI strategy, which will be unveiled in the first quarter of this year, is rooted in the concept of 'AI for all.'

articles.title: Scientists identify secret ingredient in Leonardo da Vinci paintings
articles.description: "Old Masters" such as Leonardo da Vinci, Sandro Botticelli and Rembrandt may have used proteins, especially egg yolk, in their oil paintings, according to a new study.

articles.title: Letters, Jan. 29, 2026: ‘Couldn’t have known about feeder-main situation’
articles.description: Hindsight is 20/20 A phrase that everyone should learn is ‘hindsight bias,’ the fallacious belief that ‘we should have known better,’ without considering that we did not know then what we do now. articles.title: Silicon Valley Bank collapse renews calls to address disparities impacting entrepreneurs of color
articles.description: When customers at Silicon Valley Bank rushed to withdraw billions of dollars last month, venture capitalist Arlan Hamilton stepped in to help some of the founders of color who panicked about losing access to payroll funds.

articles.title: Big-box stores could help slash emissions and save millions by putting solar panels on roofs. Why aren't more of them doing it?
articles.description: As the US attempts to wean itself off its heavy reliance on fossil fuels and shift to cleaner energy sources, many experts are eyeing a promising solution: your neighborhood big-box stores and shopping malls.

articles.title: A record breaking gravitational wave is helping test Einstein’s theory of general relativity
articles.description: A newly detected gravitational wave, GW250114, is giving scientists their clearest look yet at a black hole collision—and a powerful way to test Einstein’s theory of gravity. articles.title: JAY GOLDBERG: Time to open up domestic economy is now
articles.description: It’s time for Canadians to open up our economy — to ourselves. articles.title: Letters, Jan. 31, 2026: ‘Canada lost a true talent’
articles.description: Unique talent I’m deeply saddened by the loss of Catherine O’Hara at age 71.
